pkgmetadata.longdescription: c2cgeoportal is the server part of `GeoMapFish <http://geomapfish.org/>`_,the client part is `ngeo <https://github.com/camptocamp/ngeo/>`_,the old client and API part is `CGXP <https://github.com/camptocamp/cgxp/>`_.Read the `Documentation <https://camptocamp.github.io/c2cgeoportal/master/>`_.`Sources<https://github.com/camptocamp/c2cgeoportal/>`_
